text: We publish all developer related changes and announcements via the developer changelog at: <http://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog|developers.HubSpot.com/changelog>. We don't yet have a blog but are working on it. I would say stay tuned there or in the developer community forums at:<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Developers/ct-p/developers>
and we'll announce it here in slack as well

Hey devs! Awesome chatting with many of you at the developer day. Great job coming together to put something amazing together :smile: :rocket:

Here is a quick doc outlining some information <@U22VBL87M> and I chatted about, with some next steps if you are interested in playing around with concepts/tools we talked about: <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1_FiA-wFENwZ1cGFWJA9oYjzRRD76cgxZXwfXeJcakkU/edit?usp=sharing>

*NOTE*: The first accounts we will be ungating for the noted soon-to-be-beta features when they are ready will be Developer Sandbox Portals, so make sure to spin one up here (<https://offers.HubSpot.com/free-cms-developer-sandbox>) and fill out the form in the doc

Thanks for listening. With :heart:,
HubSpot CMS Developer Squad

thanks <@U22VBL87M> and <@U6W3H6YN8> for making development more easier and interested! submitted the form and waiting for approval, but i tested the rest only images were unable to upload, rest works like charm :slightly_smiling_face:

Hey <@U6W3H6YN8> is there a significant difference between CMS Sandbox Accounts and test portals spun up via app developer portals? Just curious. Might be a good opportunity for some kind of comparison page, it gets a bit confusing what the differences are between Marketplace accounts, Integration accounts, and now sandbox accounts
<@UK3KAAFRP> I'll also DM you in case I can point you in the right direction for anything specific.
